description:
Yesterday
N
React Native Mobile developer
Njia Hub
Rest of Nigeria (Nationwide)
Confidential
Minimum Qualification :
Job Description/Requirements

About Us

NjiaHub is on a mission to empower consumers in Nigeria with the tools to make informed purchasing decisions. As we launch our first flagship project Maoni, we’re looking for a highly skilled Mid Level Full Stack Engineer with a strong focus on front-end development to join our dynamic team.

This role demands expertise in JavaScript, React Native, and Expo. Backend development using Golang is a big Bonus. The ideal candidate is a team player with a passion for building scalable, user-centric applications and the ability to collaborate across multiple time zones.

Key Responsibilities

Front-End Development:
Design and development of responsive, cross-platform mobile applications using TypeScript, React Native, and Expo.
Ensure a seamless user experience through high-quality UI/UX implementation.
Collaborate with senior engineers and design teams to translate wireframes and mockups into functional applications.

Collaboration & Communication:
Work closely with cross-functional teams, including designers, product managers, and other engineers .
Collaborate effectively across time zones, ensuring timely progress and delivery.
Participate in code reviews, mentoring, and knowledge sharing.
DevOps & Deployment:
Contribute to CI/CD pipelines and ensure smooth deployment processes.
Monitor and troubleshoot issues in production environments.

RequirementsTechnical Skills:

Minimum of 5 years experience in mobile development.
Expert-level experience with React Native CLI and Expo.
Proficiency in JavaScript/TypeScript and modern front-end workflows.
Experience with mobile app optimization for performance and responsiveness.
Experience with RESTful APIs, GraphQL, and database systems (e.g., PostgreSQL, MongoDB).

Other Requirements:

Proven track record of delivering high-quality, scalable applications.
Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills.
Strong written and verbal communication skills to work effectively across time zones.
Ability to manage competing priorities and deliver on deadlines.

Nice-to-Haves

Familiarity with performance monitoring tools like Sentry, New Relic, or similar.
Experience working in startup environments.
Golang
Knowledge of mobile-specific challenges such as battery optimization and push notifications.

What We Offer

Competitive salary and benefits. N300k - N500K
Flexible working hours and a fully remote environment.
Opportunity to shape the future of a fast-growing app with a meaningful mission.
A supportive and collaborative team that values innovation and growth.

Ready to Join Us?

If you’re excited about building impactful technology that shapes consumer experiences, we’d love to hear from you! and become part of Maoni App’s journey.

<

Ready to Join Us?

  • If you’re excited about building impactful technology that shapes consumer experiences, we’d love to hear from you! and become part of Maoni App’s journey.

description:
*About Us:* We are an early-stage startup building a cutting-edge Sales Copilot designed to automate account research for B2B sales teams. Our platform leverages powerful Large Language Models (LLMs) such as ChatGPT and Anthropic to deliver insightful, accurate, and actionable account intelligence.

*What We're Looking For:* We're seeking a backend Software Engineer who's excited about shaping the core of our platform. While full-stack skills are a plus, your expertise will primarily lie in backend development, infrastructure, database design, and optimizing interactions with LLMs.

*Tech Stack:*
* Backend: Golang
* Database: SQL
* Frontend: TypeScript with React
* AI/LLMs: ChatGPT, Anthropic, and related APIs

*Responsibilities:*
* Architect and build scalable backend systems in Golang.
* Design robust database schemas and queries using SQL.
* Integrate and optimize Large Language Models for high-quality, reliable outputs.
* Proactively manage and mitigate common LLM issues such as hallucinations, ensuring accuracy and reliability.
* Contribute significantly to product design and architecture decisions.

*What You Bring:*
* Strong backend engineering experience, particularly in Golang and SQL.
* (Optional) Comfort with React and TypeScript (Frontend skills beneficial but not required).
* Deep interest or experience in Large Language Models (LLMs) like ChatGPT and Anthropic, with the ability to explain their strengths, weaknesses, and ideal use cases.
* Critical thinker interested in solving complex AI challenges, particularly related to output quality and hallucination.
* Exceptional design skills—able to translate complex requirements into clean, maintainable architecture.
* Passion for reading, staying updated on latest tech developments, and continuous learning.

*Interview Process:*
* *First Call (1 Hour)*: Introductory conversation followed by a manual coding and design question (no AI assistance).
* *Second Call (1 Hour)*: Practical demonstration of AI-assisted coding, involving coding/design/database questions, along with a discussion of the limitations and challenges of AI-generated code.

*Compensation:*
* ₦1,500,000 per month (contract basis), paid twice a month
* Note: will need to supply own materials

*Location:*
* Remote - Nigeria
* We are based in Los Angeles, CA

*Team:*
* You will be the 2nd engineer hire and should be able to mentor

If you're eager to build at the intersection of sales intelligence and AI, we'd love to connect!

Job Type: Full-time

Pay: ₦1,500,000.00 per month

description:
About the Job:

We’re on the hunt for a talented backend engineer to join the ironSource Exchange R&D team. It’s a chance to work on our core server products, help build cutting-edge tools, and support the Exchange department in staying ahead of the competition while driving revenue growth.
What You’ll Do
Develop and maintain large-scale web servers, as well as support our current backend systems.
Be accountable for your work: from technical design and coding to testing, deploying, maintaining, and documenting.
Collaborate with Product, DevOps, and DataOps teams.
Actively participate in planning processes and contribute to improving team performance.
On Call
What We’re Looking For
3-5 years of experience as a Golang developer.
At least 2 years of hands-on work designing and building large, scalable systems.
A self-driven, independent worker with a knack for innovation.
Strong interpersonal and written communication skills.
Familiarity with tools like AI agents ChatGPT, Claude, or Copilot for accelerating development, and experience working in agile environments with CI/CD practices.
Comfortable using Linux and the terminal.
A good understanding of Git workflows.
Experience working with cloud platforms like AWS.
Bonus Points For
Knowledge of MySQL/PostgreSQL, Aerospike, Redis, or working with large datasets.
Experience building and managing data pipelines.
Awareness of how cloud costs impact design and development.
Benefits
Work in a highly professional team. Informal and friendly atmosphere in the team.
Ability to work from our comfortable downtown office in Warsaw
Paid vacation — 20 business days per year, 100% sick leave payment
3 additional Friday-days off (U days) during the year
5 sick days per year
Equipment provision
Medical insurance (after the end of the probationary period)
Partially compensated educational costs (for courses, certifications, professional events, etc.)
Inflation-protected wages with regular revision of compensation conditions
English and Polish courses — 2 times a week
Bright and memorable corporate life: corporate parties 2 times a year, gifts to employees in honor of life events
descriptionHTML:
About the Job:

We’re on the hunt for a talented backend engineer to join the ironSource Exchange R&D team. It’s a chance to work on our core server products, help build cutting-edge tools, and support the Exchange department in staying ahead of the competition while driving revenue growth.

What You’ll Do

  • Develop and maintain large-scale web servers, as well as support our current backend systems.
  • Be accountable for your work: from technical design and coding to testing, deploying, maintaining, and documenting.
  • Collaborate with Product, DevOps, and DataOps teams.
  • Actively participate in planning processes and contribute to improving team performance.
  • On Call

What We’re Looking For

  • 3-5 years of experience as a Golang developer.
  • At least 2 years of hands-on work designing and building large, scalable systems.
  • A self-driven, independent worker with a knack for innovation.
  • Strong interpersonal and written communication skills.
  • Familiarity with tools like AI agents ChatGPT, Claude, or Copilot for accelerating development, and experience working in agile environments with CI/CD practices.
  • Comfortable using Linux and the terminal.
  • A good understanding of Git workflows.
  • Experience working with cloud platforms like AWS.

Bonus Points For

  • Knowledge of MySQL/PostgreSQL, Aerospike, Redis, or working with large datasets.
  • Experience building and managing data pipelines.
  • Awareness of how cloud costs impact design and development.

Benefits

  • Work in a highly professional team. Informal and friendly atmosphere in the team.
  • Ability to work from our comfortable downtown office in Warsaw
  • Paid vacation — 20 business days per year, 100% sick leave payment
  • 3 additional Friday-days off (U days) during the year
  • 5 sick days per year
  • Equipment provision
  • Medical insurance (after the end of the probationary period)
  • Partially compensated educational costs (for courses, certifications, professional events, etc.)
  • Inflation-protected wages with regular revision of compensation conditions
  • English and Polish courses — 2 times a week
  • Bright and memorable corporate life: corporate parties 2 times a year, gifts to employees in honor of life events

companyInfo.companyDescription:
Hey! It’s On The Spot.

We help tech companies from Israel, the UK, and the US build dedicated R&D teams.

Since 2016, we've worked with big names like Cycode, Orca Security, Unity, Tripledot, and others, helping them launch over 30 teams that integrate seamlessly into their business.

You’ll join On The Spot as a member of our customer’s R&D team and will contribute to the development of their innovative product first hand. The customer will set your tasks, define the workflow and perform overall managing activities, while On The Spot will be your direct employer in Poland. 

On The Spot’s back-office team will make sure you have an enjoyable work environment. We provide a comfortable office with up-to-date equipment, HR & legal support, a competitive benefits package, and a bright corporate life.

As a company founded by engineers, we continue to learn and support the growth of engineering skills. We host engaging TechSpot meetups where we connect with top minds in tech, discuss current challenges and trends in building software on our 137 podcast, and organize other activities that keep us in the loop of tech wonders and breakthroughs.

Add hackathons and workshops our R&D teams get to participate in, and you’ll see that there’s never a dull moment at On The Spot.

description:
Job Summary



We are seeking an experienced Full Stack Developer to lead the development of a secure, scalable, and high-performance crypto-to-naira exchange platform. The ideal candidate must have expertise in blockchain integration, payment gateways, and real-time transaction processing for both web and mobile applications.



⸻



Key Responsibilities



1. Backend Development:

	•	Design and implement a secure and scalable backend architecture.

	•	Develop real-time trading, wallet, and transaction processing features.

	•	Integrate blockchain APIs (Binance, Ethereum, Bitcoin, etc.) to enable deposits, withdrawals, and trading.

	•	Build automated KYC verification (ID verification, selfie verification).

	•	Implement anti-fraud security features like 2FA, IP tracking, and AML compliance.

	•	Develop a robust admin dashboard for monitoring transactions and user activities.



2. Frontend Development:

	•	Build a responsive web platform (React, Next.js, or Vue.js preferred).

	•	Develop a mobile-friendly interface (React Native, Flutter, or Swift/Kotlin).

	•	Optimize UI/UX for fast transactions and seamless user experience.

	•	Implement real-time price updates using WebSockets.



3. Database & Security:

	•	Design and manage scalable databases (PostgreSQL, MongoDB, or MySQL).

	•	Implement data encryption & secure authentication (OAuth, JWT, 2FA, Google Authenticator).

	•	Ensure compliance with GDPR, AML, and PCI-DSS security standards.



4. API & Third-Party Integrations:

	•	Integrate crypto payment gateways (CoinPayments, NowPayments, etc.).

	•	Connect with local Naira payment processors (Paystack, Flutterwave, Monnify).

	•	Implement automated exchange rate updates via third-party APIs.



⸻



Requirements & Qualifications

	•	3+ years of experience as a Full Stack Developer in crypto, fintech, or payments.

	•	Proficiency in backend technologies (Node.js, Python, Golang, or PHP Laravel).

	•	Strong experience in frontend frameworks (React, Next.js, Vue.js).

	•	Database management skills (MongoDB, PostgreSQL, Firebase, MySQL).

	•	Experience with blockchain APIs & Web3.js (Solidity knowledge is a plus).

	•	Familiarity with payment gateway integrations (Paystack, Flutterwave, Binance Pay, etc.).

	•	Strong knowledge of RESTful & GraphQL APIs, WebSockets.

	•	Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Google Cloud, or DigitalOcean).

	•	Familiarity with DevOps tools (Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD pipelines).

	•	Solid understanding of cryptography & security best practices.

	•	Ability to write clean, scalable, and maintainable code.



⸻



Nice to Have (Bonus Skills)

	•	Knowledge of Solidity & Smart Contracts.

	•	Experience with AI/ML for fraud detection.

	•	Prior work in a crypto exchange, P2P trading platform, or fintech startup.

Job Type: Full-time

Pay: ₦400,000.00 per month


Expected Start Date: 02/04/2025
descriptionHTML:
Job Summary

We are seeking an experienced Full Stack Developer to lead the development of a secure, scalable, and high-performance crypto-to-naira exchange platform. The ideal candidate must have expertise in blockchain integration, payment gateways, and real-time transaction processing for both web and mobile applications.

⸻

Key Responsibilities

1. Backend Development:

  • Design and implement a secure and scalable backend architecture.
  • Develop real-time trading, wallet, and transaction processing features.
  • Integrate blockchain APIs (Binance, Ethereum, Bitcoin, etc.) to enable deposits, withdrawals, and trading.
  • Build automated KYC verification (ID verification, selfie verification).
  • Implement anti-fraud security features like 2FA, IP tracking, and AML compliance.
  • Develop a robust admin dashboard for monitoring transactions and user activities.

2. Frontend Development:

  • Build a responsive web platform (React, Next.js, or Vue.js preferred).
  • Develop a mobile-friendly interface (React Native, Flutter, or Swift/Kotlin).
  • Optimize UI/UX for fast transactions and seamless user experience.
  • Implement real-time price updates using WebSockets.

3. Database & Security:

  • Design and manage scalable databases (PostgreSQL, MongoDB, or MySQL).
  • Implement data encryption & secure authentication (OAuth, JWT, 2FA, Google Authenticator).
  • Ensure compliance with GDPR, AML, and PCI-DSS security standards.

4. API & Third-Party Integrations:

  • Integrate crypto payment gateways (CoinPayments, NowPayments, etc.).
  • Connect with local Naira payment processors (Paystack, Flutterwave, Monnify).
  • Implement automated exchange rate updates via third-party APIs.

⸻

Requirements & Qualifications

  • 3+ years of experience as a Full Stack Developer in crypto, fintech, or payments.
  • Proficiency in backend technologies (Node.js, Python, Golang, or PHP Laravel).
  • Strong experience in frontend frameworks (React, Next.js, Vue.js).
  • Database management skills (MongoDB, PostgreSQL, Firebase, MySQL).
  • Experience with blockchain APIs & Web3.js (Solidity knowledge is a plus).
  • Familiarity with payment gateway integrations (Paystack, Flutterwave, Binance Pay, etc.).
  • Strong knowledge of RESTful & GraphQL APIs, WebSockets.
  • Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Google Cloud, or DigitalOcean).
  • Familiarity with DevOps tools (Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD pipelines).
  • Solid understanding of cryptography & security best practices.
  • Ability to write clean, scalable, and maintainable code.

⸻

Nice to Have (Bonus Skills)

  • Knowledge of Solidity & Smart Contracts.
  • Experience with AI/ML for fraud detection.
  • Prior work in a crypto exchange, P2P trading platform, or fintech startup.

Job Type: Full-time

Pay: ₦400,000.00 per month

Expected Start Date: 02/04/2025

description:
About the company

Pryme is a multi-currency fintech platform designed to empower individuals and businesses with seamless, innovative financial solutions for personal and business accounts. We are redefining global banking for a new generation by enabling effortless cross-border transactions, flexible multi-currency management, and tailored financial products that meet the unique needs of our users. At Pryme, our culture is built on four core pillars: Ownership, where every team member takes responsibility for their work and its impact; Taking Steps, encouraging bold and proactive actions toward solving challenges; Collaboration, fostering teamwork and shared successes; and Making Things Happen, delivering results with a relentless focus on execution. By driving global impact while maintaining local relevance, we strive to make banking accessible, efficient, and meaningful for our customers worldwide.

About the role

Pryme is looking for an experienced Full-Stack Software Engineer proficient in Golang for backend development and JavaScript (NuxtJS) for frontend work. This role will focus on developing efficient, scalable web applications, managing data flow, and ensuring optimal performance through caching and event-driven systems.

Responsibilities

Develop and maintain backend services and APIs using Golang.
Build and maintain responsive, user-centered frontend applications using NuxtJS and Vue.js.
Design and implement user interfaces with Tailwind CSS and Bootstrap for a clean, cohesive user experience.
Manage databases (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL) and optimize application performance with caching solutions like Redis or Memcached.
Integrate event-driven systems such as Kafka to support asynchronous processes and data streaming.
Work closely with cross-functional teams to design, develop, and deploy new features.
Optimize applications for performance, scalability, and responsiveness.
Debug, troubleshoot, and resolve issues across the full stack.
Stay updated on industry best practices, tools, and technologies.

Requirements:

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent practical experience).
Proven experience as a Full-Stack Engineer with proficiency in Golang
Strong experience with JavaScript frameworks, particularly NuxtJS and Vue.js.
Experience developing SaaS-style applications and/or public APIs.
Hands-on experience with SQL schema design, SOLID principles, REST API design
Proficiency in using version control systems (e.g., Git) and collaboration tools.
Strong problem-solving and analytical skills, with a keen attention to detail.
Ability to work effectively both independently and collaboratively within a team.
Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
Strong organizational and time management skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks effectively.
Database management experience (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL) and proficiency with caching systems like Redis or Memcached.
Experience with event streaming technologies such as Kafka or similar systems.
Proficiency with version control systems, preferably Git.
Strong problem-solving abilities and attention to detail.
Experience in Financial Services is an advantage.
Experience with other programming languages and technologies, such as Java, Golang, or containerization (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes), is a plus.

Why Join Us?

Be part of an innovative Fintech transforming the financial landscape for businesses.
Work in an exciting, growth-focused environment where you can collaborate and contribute meaningfully to sector-specific strategies.
Opportunity for professional development and career growth

By submitting this application, I confirm that all the information given by me in this application for employment and any additional documents attached hereto are true to the best of my knowledge and that I have not wilfully suppressed any material fact. I confirm I have disclosed if applicable any previous employment with Pryme Financials Ltd. I accept that if any of the information given by me in this application is in any way false or incorrect, my application may be rejected, any offer of employment may be withdrawn or my employment with Pryme Financials Ltd may be terminated summarily or I may be dismissed. By submitting this application, I agree that my personal data will be processed in accordance with Pryme Financials Ltd's Candidate Privacy Notice
descriptionHTML:

Pryme is a multi-currency fintech platform designed to empower individuals and businesses with seamless, innovative financial solutions for personal and business accounts. We are redefining global banking for a new generation by enabling effortless cross-border transactions, flexible multi-currency management, and tailored financial products that meet the unique needs of our users. By driving global impact while maintaining local relevance, we strive to make banking accessible, efficient, and meaningful for our customers worldwide.

About the role

Pryme is looking for an experienced Full-Stack Software Engineer proficient in Golang for backend development and JavaScript (NuxtJS) for frontend work. This role will focus on developing efficient, scalable web applications, managing data flow, and ensuring optimal performance through caching and event-driven systems.

Responsibilities

  • Develop and maintain backend services and APIs using Golang.
  • Build and maintain responsive, user-centered frontend applications using NuxtJS and Vue.js.
  • Design and implement user interfaces with Tailwind CSS and Bootstrap for a clean, cohesive user experience.
  • Manage databases (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL) and optimize application performance with caching solutions like Redis or Memcached.
  • Integrate event-driven systems such as Kafka to support asynchronous processes and data streaming.
  • Work closely with cross-functional teams to design, develop, and deploy new features.
  • Optimize applications for performance, scalability, and responsiveness.
  • Debug, troubleshoot, and resolve issues across the full stack.
  • Stay updated on industry best practices, tools, and technologies.


Requirements:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent practical experience).
  • Proven experience as a Full-Stack Engineer with proficiency in Golang
  • Strong experience with JavaScript frameworks, particularly NuxtJS and Vue.js.
  • Experience developing SaaS-style applications and/or public APIs.
  • Hands-on experience with SQL schema design, SOLID principles, REST API design
  • Proficiency in using version control systems (e.g., Git) and collaboration tools.
  • Strong problem-solving and analytical skills, with a keen attention to detail.
  • Ability to work effectively both independently and collaboratively within a team.
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
  • Strong organizational and time management skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks effectively.
  • Database management experience (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL) and proficiency with caching systems like Redis or Memcached.
  • Experience with event streaming technologies such as Kafka or similar systems.
  • Proficiency with version control systems, preferably Git.
  • Strong problem-solving abilities and attention to detail.
  • Experience in Financial Services is an advantage.
  • Experience with other programming languages and technologies, such as Java, Golang, or containerization (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes), is a plus.


Why Join Us?

  • Be part of an innovative Fintech transforming the financial landscape for businesses.
  • Work in an exciting, growth-focused environment where you can collaborate and contribute meaningfully to sector-specific strategies.
  • Opportunity for professional development and career growth

By submitting this application, I confirm that all the information given by me in this application for employment and any additional documents attached hereto are true to the best of my knowledge and that I have not wilfully suppressed any material fact. I confirm I have disclosed if applicable any previous employment with Pryme Financials Ltd. I accept that if any of the information given by me in this application is in any way false or incorrect, my application may be rejected, any offer of employment may be withdrawn or my employment with Pryme Financials Ltd may be terminated summarily or I may be dismissed. By submitting this application, I agree that my personal data will be processed in accordance with Pryme Financials Ltd's Candidate Privacy Notice

description:
Backend Developer (Go)
Skache Integrated Services
Software & Data
Lagos Full Time
Banking, Finance & Insurance NGN 900,000 - 1,200,000
 Easy Apply
Job Summary

Our client, a foremost MFB is looking for a skilled Backend Developer with expertise in Go (Golang) to join our team. The ideal candidate will have experience in developing banking applications and will be responsible for designing and implementing backend services and APIs for our banking solutions.

Minimum Qualification : Degree
Experience Level : Mid level
Experience Length : 4 years
Job Description/Requirements

Responsibilities:

Design and implement backend services and APIs using Go (Golang).
Manage databases to ensure efficient and secure data storage and retrieval.
Implement security best practices to protect sensitive banking data on the backend.
Optimize backend performance for efficient processing and data handling.
Work closely with frontend developers to ensure seamless integration between frontend and backend components.
Conduct thorough testing and debugging to ensure the reliability and stability of backend services.
Maintain clear and comprehensive documentation for the backend code and system architecture.

Requirements:

Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
Minimum of 3 years of experience in backend development with a focus on Go (Golang).
Proven experience in developing banking applications is required.
Proficiency in Go (Golang), strong understanding of RESTful APIs, database management, and security best practices.
Relevant certifications in Go or banking application development are a plus.
Meticulous attention to detail to ensure the quality and security of backend services.
Strong problem-solving skills to address technical challenges and find effective solutions.
Ability to work effectively in a team environment and collaborate with colleagues across different departments.

Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted
